ED_Title: Report of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization
ED_DecisionText:
At its 24th plenary meeting, on 5 October 2016, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization. 

(See A/71/1; A/71/PV.24)
ED_Disclaimer: The text of this decision is available in all languages in document A/71/49 (Vol. II).
